item.title: Clash Royale: Best Arena 11 Decks
item.description:
You start Clash Royale with just eight cards, but as you climb the ladder and earn trophies, you will unlock new arenas and more cards. Each arena gives you new options, so if you don’t update your deck, winning matches can get quite tough.

Arena 11 unlocks once you hit 3,400 trophies. It’s called Electro Valley, and here, you will get access to some really strong cards and a new tower troop. This article will go over some of the best decks you can use to climb through Clash Royale’s Arena 11.

Best Clash Royale Arena 11 Decks (Electro Valley)

Once players hit Arena 11, they will unlock eight new cards . These include Mega Knight, Sparky, Ram Rider, Inferno Dragon, Miner, Electro Wizard, Princess, and The Log.

Double Barrel Mega Knight Deck

Clash Royale Cards

Elixir Cost

Bats

Two

Goblin Cage

Four

Dart Goblin

Three

Zap

Two

Goblin Barrel

Three

Skeleton Barrel

Three

Goblin Gang

Three

Mega Knight

Seven

This deck is quite aggressive because you’ve got two win conditions : Goblin Barrel and Skeleton Barrel. Dart Goblin is there to keep the pressure going and force your opponent to waste elixir on defense.

For evolution slots, we recommend going with the Skeleton Barrel and the Mega Knight.

The game plan is simple. Deal as much damage as you can in the first two minutes, then, once double elixir kicks in, turn up the heat with your Mega Knight.

You only have Zap as a spell here, but if you feel like you need more, you can swap out one of the win conditions for another spell. Personally, I think it works great just the way it is.

The average elixir cost of this Clash Royale’s arena 11 deck is 3.4.

Miner Balloon Deck

Clash Royale Cards

Elixir Cost

Balloon

Five

Miner

Three

Skeletons

One

Musketeer

Four

Ice Golem

Two

Bomb Tower

Four

The Log

Two

Giant Snowball

Two

This deck used to be really popular a few seasons back, and it still works great. For defense, you’ve got the classic trio of Musketeer, Skeletons, and Ice Golem. Bomb Tower is your building, while The Log and Giant Snowball are your spells.

For evolution slots, we recommend going with Musketeer and Skeletons.

The Giant Snowball is especially nice with the Balloon since it pushes troops away and freezes them just long enough for your Balloon to hit the tower. You can also try the new Vines spell instead of Snowball. It does more damage and freezes for longer, but keep in mind that new cards usually get nerfed pretty fast.

The average elixir cost of this Clash Royale’s arena 11 deck is 2.9.

Mega Knight Sparky Deck

Clash Royale Cards

Elixir Cost

Sparky

Six

Witch

Five

Dart Goblin

Three

Bats

Two

Bomber

Two

The Log

Two

Goblin Barrel

Three

Spear Goblins

Two

This is pretty much the only Sparky deck that really works in Arena 11. You’ve got Evo Witch, Bomber, Bats, and Spear Goblins for defense, and then you build a big push behind Sparky . The main win condition here is Goblin Barrel, but if you have unlocked Evo Skeleton Barrel, that’s a good option too.

For evolution slots, we recommend going with Witch and Dart Goblin.

The key is to protect your Sparky at all costs . Even a couple of hits from it can flip the game in your favor. Having said that, if you don’t have Evo Witch yet, this deck is not going to feel as strong.

The average elixir cost of this Clash Royale’s arena 11 deck is 3.1.

8.6 /10

Clash Royale

item.title: Best Open World Games For Feeling Weak & Underpowered
item.description:
Summary

  • Some open-world games challenge players with overpowered enemies and constant difficulty spikes.
  • Games like Zombi and Days Gone emphasize survival and avoiding fights for better gameplay.
  • Elden Ring and Monster Hunter Wilds focus on player adaptability with tough enemies to defeat.

Open-world video games are generally designed to empower players, allowing protagonists to conquer their expansive environments gradually. However, some games take a different approach by immersing players in open worlds that keep them in an underpowered state, forcing them to adapt to constant challenges and sudden difficulty spikes.

While most games provide ways for the main character to become stronger and overcome these challenges, many open-world games—whether in the horror, action-adventure, or RPG genres—feature overpowered enemies and increasingly difficult gameplay. As a result, even when players have fully upgraded their characters or obtained the best weapons, they often still feel outmatched by the challenges that lie ahead.

Zombi

Beginners Are In For A Relentless Romp Through London

Zombi
Survival Horror
Systems
Released
August 18, 2015

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
M For Mature 17+ Due To Intense Violence, Blood and Gore, Strong Language
3 Images
Powered by

In a sea of zombie video games, Zombi is often overlooked despite its high quality, featuring a London-set story that pays homage to British zombie movies like 28 Days Later and Shaun Of The Dead . The game features Resident Evil -style item management and relentless zombies that regularly challenge players, often leading to death and subsequent respawning as new survivors, who must then find their zombified former selves.

Not only does the concept give Zombi a unique identity, but it also makes it one of the most challenging zombie open-world games as players scavenge every nook and cranny of London’s streets for supplies. It can take hours just to advance through one section of the story, and the zombies never get easier to deal with, even with the best weapons in the game.

The Legend Of Zelda: Breath Of The Wild

Nintendo Changed The Legend Of Zelda For The Better

The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
10 /10
48
9.2 /10
Released
March 3, 2017

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
E for Everyone: Fantasy Violence, Use of Alcohol, Mild Suggestive Themes
Powered by

Link is known for being able to take on any enemy with the right equipment in his other games, but in The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild , he is outmatched by even the most basic Moblins. Once the initial training area is complete, Hyrule is available to explore in any direction, and that can result in meeting the Guardians and Lynels far too early, resulting in Link's inevitable demise.

The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild introduces weapon and shield durability, which can be frustrating early on as items break and players have to find replacements. Additionally, Link is noticeably weaker in Breath Of The Wild , as most enemies can take out three heart pieces with a single hit, forcing the player to grind and complete as many shrines and upgrades as possible to survive.

Subnautica

The Entire Planet Is An Ocean Of Terror

Subnautica
13
9.2 /10
Released
January 23, 2018

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
E10+ for Everyone 10+: Fantasy Violence, Mild Language
Powered by

On the one hand, Subnautica excels at making the player truly feel like the sole survivor of a spacecraft on an undiscovered alien planet, surrounded by nothing but ocean for miles. It executes its concept well, balancing the ability to craft new equipment and weapons with the constant dread of a Leviathan swimming up from the depths to make a kill.

As players progress through the game, they encounter increasingly larger underwater monsters. The combination of breathtaking visuals and survival-focused gameplay has solidified Subnautica as a modern classic. Before first-time players have the chance to build a vehicle or a base, they often feel overwhelmed by the presence of underwater creatures and the constant need to surface for air.

Stranded Deep

Sharks Are The Least Of The Players’ Concerns

Stranded Deep
8.0 /10
Released
April 21, 2020

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
T For Teen due to Blood, Crude Humor, Mild Violence
Powered by

If Cast Away and Minecraft had a baby, the result would be Stranded Deep , an open-world sandbox in which players can travel between a multitude of remote islands scattered across an endless ocean. From scavenging wood and rock for creating makeshift tools to hunting deadly sharks in the ocean, Stranded Deep always feels like a nightmare scenario brought to life.

Even if the player knows all the ingredients to craft a tool or a piece for their raft, they are still at the mercy of the procedurally generated world and islands. Not every landmass is guaranteed to have the items needed not only to advance, but also to keep the protagonist alive, especially when sharks, poison, and even too much sun can kill the player in short order.

Days Gone

Players Are Better Off Never Fighting The Zombies

Days Gone
8 /10
37
9.1 /10
Released
April 26, 2019

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Drug Reference, Intense Violence, Sexual Themes, Strong Language
Powered by

While Deacon St. John is a skilled survivor in Days Gone , he is not a superhero with unlimited means of taking out the zombie-like monsters known as Freakers. The majority of the game is spent avoiding the zombies, especially if they are in hordes, because when working together, they swarm like a hive of ants, and it’s nearly impossible to kill them.

Days Gone is well-known for its motorcycle gameplay. To enhance realism, players must find gas to fuel Deacon’s bike and perform maintenance; otherwise, it will break down. Even after obtaining the best upgrades and fully automatic weapons, it is often more effective to avoid Freakers or to eliminate them using a stealthy approach.

Don’t Starve

A Game That Manages To Be Cute And Stressful All At Once

Don't Starve
8.0 /10
Released
April 23, 2013

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
T For Teen due to Fantasy, Violence, Crude Humor
Powered by

Don’t Starve is another attempt to replicate the survival game style, similar to Minecraft , but with a dark and whimsical aesthetic that fans of Tim Burton are sure to enjoy. The visuals may be cute, but the gameplay aligns with the title, as it is a struggle to stay alive, especially for beginners who may not be familiar with the game’s mechanics and crafting recipes.

During the daytime, Don’t Starve presents a challenge in finding the right materials, but even just touching the wrong object can have serious consequences, including, but not limited to, teleporting the player to the opposite side of the map. At night, however, Don’t Starve becomes a whole different beast, with pitch-black darkness that can lead to insanity, which has understandably adverse effects on the gameplay.

The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt

Hunting Ghouls And Goblins Is Not A Walk In The Park

The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
9 /10
55
9.5 /10
Released
May 19, 2015

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Use of Alcohol, Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Nudity, Strong Language, Strong Sexual Content
Powered by

Despite Geralt of Rivia being known as the greatest monster hunter on The Continent, The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt is far from a breeze when it comes to facing the many creatures and evil beings in the game. Not only does the player have to do the proper research to find which sword, oils, and magics to use, but they also have to make sure they have the stats for such a fight.

Even with all the preparation in the world, it is not always guaranteed that fights will go smoothly. The Witcher 3 has massive maps that feel daunting to explore because trolls, giant spiders, and undead lurk around every corner. Swinging swords wildly is not the way to go, especially when dealing with higher-level enemies that can easily dodge or have high defense.

Monster Hunter Wilds

Upgrading Equipment Is The Bread And Butter Of The Series

Monster Hunter Wilds
58
8.2 /10
Released
February 28, 2025

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
T For Teen // Violence, Blood, Crude Humor
10 Images
Powered by

Feeling underpowered compared to the enemies is practically the central concept of Monster Hunter , and that continues with Monster Hunter Wilds , which provides a large open world to play in. Like other Monster Hunter games, the player has to build new equipment using materials gathered from hunted creatures, but the game never becomes easy.

Each new monster introduced is a behemoth of teeth, spikes, and supernatural abilities, which turns Monster Hunter Wilds into a gauntlet for gamers, especially when playing solo. Every monster has its unique weaknesses and methods for bringing them down that take a lot of patience to master, but even with strong weapons, it’s far from easy to complete a hunt.

Elden Ring

Even Dark Souls Veterans Aren’t Ready For It

Elden Ring
10 /10
69
9.1 /10
Released
February 25, 2022

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Language, Suggestive Themes, Violence
6 Images
Powered by

The developers at FromSoftware already excelled at punishing gamers with iconic games like Dark Souls and Bloodborne , but they took it even further with an open world in Elden Ring . It’s the same concept as Dark Souls , with absurdly strong enemies and bosses that can take out the player with one hit or reward them with experience points that are instantly lost the next time they die.

While there are changes and even improvements made to the Soulslike formula, anyone who has played FromSoftware’s previous titles can get an idea of what challenges are ahead in Elden Ring . Unlike past games, farming experience points to try leveling up stats barely helps, with most of the upgrades coming from dropped items, forcing beginners to rethink their Soulslike tactics.

item.title: Best Cheap Games You Can Play For Hundreds Of Hours
item.description:
Not all video games with impressive lengths need to burn a hole in a player's wallet. Some classic video games that have aged gracefully, coupled with indie games that are reasonably priced, ensure that players can comfortably embark on a 100+ hour adventure without compromising on their finances.

These games are usually available at reasonable prices and become downright steals during sale periods. Players will pay peanuts for this game only to recoup their investment and then some after investing a silly number of hours in these titles.

8 Fallout: New Vegas

The Courier's Adventure Are Very Long On A Single Playthrough Alone

Fallout: New Vegas
8 /10
22
8.9 /10
Released
October 19, 2010

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Sexual Content, Strong Language, Use of Drugs
Powered by

New Vegas is a game bursting with content, with the main game and its DLCs ensuring that players will comfortably spend north of a hundred hours in this game. Given the many years that have passed since this title's release, it's easy to see why the game is priced at a reasonable rate.

If players haven't played New Vegas yet, they're missing out on some of the best role-playing in a video game. Players can clock in multiple playthroughs to see how this game changes with each run, further enhancing its brilliance.

7 Sunless Sea

Boasts A Ton Of Content And Serves As A Great Intro To The Fallen London Universe

Sunless Sea
RPG
Adventure
Indie Games
Shooter
Systems
Released
February 6, 2015

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
t
6 Images
Powered by

While Sunless Sea has its issues, the game serves as an excellent introduction to the Fallen London universe. Exploring the unterzee and discovering tantalizing stories across all the ports makes for a great time.

With the Zubmariner DLC, there's more content for players to uncover on the ocean floor. Achieving every ambition in the game is a tall order that takes a while to accomplish, but the game's scintillating atmosphere ensures that players will love what this title brings to the table.

6 Inscryption

Kaycee's Mod Can Bump Up The Playtime Considerably

Inscryption
8.8 /10
Released
October 19, 2021

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL

ESRB
M For Mature 17+ due to Blood, Strong Language, Violence
Powered by

Not only is Inscryption one of the most tantalizing indie games players can get their hands on, but the game boasts a ton of content that isn't apparent from the get-go. The three acts of this game are a blast to overcome as players get immersed in this mysterious, unputdownable title.

Once players are done with the main story, Kaycee's Mod is unlocked. It's here that Inscryption 's true difficulty comes to the forefront, with players having to rethink their strategy and optimize their deck in every challenge to slowly make progress and uncover all the lore still yet to be found in Inscryption .

5 The Elder Scrolls 5: Skyrim

A Modern Classic That is Quite Affordable Now

The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
9 /10
81
9.5 /10
Released
November 11, 2011

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M For Mature 17+ Due To Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Sexual Themes, Use of Alcohol
6 Images
Powered by

It's been more than a decade since Skyrim came out, and players can't get enough of the Dragonborn's adventures across the game's multiple releases. The title is priced reasonably at this point, with the base game itself taking players on an adventure that lasts hundreds of hours.

The DLCs add more things to do in this game, ensuring that players will always have a great time exploring as the Dragonborn. The main story pretty much takes a backseat as players immerse themselves in what might just be the best exploration in a Bethesda game.

4 Persona 3 Portable

Playing As Both The Male And Female MC Will Take A Long, Long Time

Persona 3 Portable
JRPG
Systems
Released
July 6, 2010

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
M For Mature 17+ Due To Blood, Language, Partial Nudity, Sexual Themes, Violence
Powered by

Sure, Persona 3 Reload may be the go-to option for players who want to check out this title, but Persona 3 Portable is the best choice for players who want to enjoy tough combat and an adventure with the FeMC.

Completing playthroughs with both protagonists will easily take more than a hundred hours. Compared to Reload , Portable is priced at a reasonable rate and is perfect for fans of story-driven JRPGs with modern settings and life sim elements.

3 The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt

One Of The Greatest (And Longest) Video Games Ever Made That's Priced Reasonably

The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
9 /10
55
9.5 /10
Released
May 19, 2015

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Use of Alcohol, Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Nudity, Strong Language, Strong Sexual Content
Powered by

Despite a next-gen patch available for this title, CD Projekt Red shows how consumer-friendly it is by pricing The Witcher 3 at a very reasonable rate. If players have somehow missed out on this groundbreaking RPG, then getting into it now is cheaper than ever before.

The base game itself is a gargantuan experience that takes a long time, and that doesn't even take the epic DLCs into account. Fans argue that both Blood & Wine and Hearts of Stone double a person's play time, which is no mean feat and shows the level of love and care that went into this beloved title.

2 Stardew Valley

The Sheer Content In This Charming Game Will Keep Players Busy For Hours

Stardew Valley
75
9.2 /10
Released
February 26, 2016

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
E for Everyone (Fantasy Violence, Mild Blood, Mild Language, Simulated Gambling, Use of Alcohol and Tobacco)
Powered by

Stardew Valley is a glowing example of how a passionate developer can single-handedly turn a passion project into one of the greatest video games ever made. Players who want to meticulously manage a farm and relax in a small town will find this game's vibes to be positively immaculate.

Maintaining the farm and ensuring that things go smoothly on this inherited property is a blast. The sheer amount of content and things to do in Stardew Valley ensures that players can enjoy hundreds of hours of gameplay without going broke.

1 The Binding Of Isaac: Rebirth

A Classic Roguelike That's Pretty Cheap And Needs No Introduction

The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth
8.7 /10
Released
November 4, 2014

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
Mature 17+ // Mature 17+ Blood and Gore, Crude Humor, Violen
12 Images
Powered by

One of the first indie successes that took the world by storm, The Binding of Isaac 's Zelda inspirations and twisted setting ensure that players will love going for just one more run to ensure that they finally conquer the game's challenges.

The game is jam-packed with content that features gameplay that players will naturally want to master. Every run is a chance for players to get stronger, eventually schooling bosses that used to give them a tough time.

item.title: All Silksong Craftmetal Locations (& Where to Use Them)
item.description:
Players will start acquiring Craftmetal fairly early on in the game, and these are valuable resources required to purchase or craft certain Tools throughout Hollow Knight: Silksong . There are a total of eight Craftmetals scattered across the massive map, some of which are hidden behind secret paths and caves, which might require having a certain ability. The guide below offers information on the location of all the Craftmetals as well as where players can use them in Hollow Knight: Silksong .

All Silksong Craftmetal Locations

Map Image

Area Name

Location

Bone Bottom

The first one is purchasable from Pebb for 60 Rosaries.

The Marrow

From the bench right of the Bellway Station , head right until you reach the second room, where you can spot a glowing explosive rock on the bottom left side. Hit this and get back so that you do not take damage. This opens up a secret path that leads to the Craftmetal.

Deep Docks

From the Forge Daughter NPC , head down and to the right to find a heavy door that requires a Simple Key to open. Explore the area up ahead until you reach a room with a locked gate with a ring hanging next to it. Opening this requires the Clawline ability, but you do not need to access this. Simply turn around, and to the left side of the room is a blockade that you can break and go inside the small room with the Craftmetal.

Blasted Steps

Head right from the Bellway Station, and you will have to make your way through a platforming section and avoid the worms below. Near the end of this section, where you have to stick to a wall on the right, head down to find a room with the Craftmetal in the far left corner.

Underworks

This is located at the end of the room, directly below where you obtain the Clawline ability. You can grab the ability first to make this section a bit easier.

Wisp Thicket

Head left from Halfway Home in Greymoor , go up the tower, and head through the passage on the right, which leads to the second tower. Go up the second tower, head up, and take the left passage to exit this tower and to the top left of this area is a spot where you can double jump to access Wisp Thicket . From the Bench in the area, head left, and when you reach the small tower-like section with the flame brazier, head up and take the path on the right to find this Craftmetal.

Songclave

You can purchase this from Jubilana for 180 Rosaries after completing The Lost Merchant Wish.

Putrified Ducts

At the extreme right of the Putrified Ducts past Fleatopia , you will need the Faydown Cloak to jump up and grab the final Craftmetal.

Where to Use the Craftmetals in Silksong

Tool

Map Image

Area Name

Location

Sting Shard

Deep Docks

You can purchase this for 140 Rosaries and 1 Craftmetal from the Forge Daughter who is at the Bellway Station and going down the lift.

Magma Bell

Deep Docks

This is purchasable from Forge Daughter for 110 Rosaries and 1 Craftmetal.

Pimpillo

Greymoor

This Tool is to the far left of the western tower, accessible by using the wall jump ability. You have to go left from the Halfway Home bench, climb the second tower, and take the upper left exit.

Cogwork Wheel

Underworks

In the room above, where you get the Clawline ability. From the bench, jump up and use your clawline to go inside the Twelfth Architect's shop . Talk to her and purchase the tool for 360 Rosaries and 1 Craftmetal.

Sawtooth Circlet

Underworks

This is purchasable from the Twelfth Architect for 230 Rosaries and 1 Craftmetal.

Scuttlebrace

Underworks

You can purchase from the Twelfth Architect for 140 Rosaries and 1 Craftmetal.

Cogfly

High Halls

From the bench inside High Halls, you have to go up quite a bit and go through the third passage on your left to find a small room . You can find an interact option at the top where you can craft the Cogfly using Craftmetal.

Silkshot

Deep Docks

Underworks

Mount Fay

For the final Craftmetal, you can rebuild the Ruined Tool into a version of the Silkshot. This can be done at the Forge Daughter in Deep Docks, the Twelfth Architect in Underworks, or inside a secret cave on Mount Fay.

35
9.2 /10

Hollow Knight: Silksong

item.title: Fortnite Leaks KPop Demon Hunters Collab
item.description:
A new leak indicates that a Fortnite and KPop Demon Hunters collaboration is in the works. If accurate, fans won't have to wait long to learn more about the Fortnite crossover, as the leak indicates that the game isn't wasting any time.

KPop Demon Hunters has been wildly popular since it premiered, becoming the most-watched Netflix title ever. The movie has also received a theatrical release that saw success, becoming the best-performing theatrical release for a Netflix movie. With all this success happening over the course of just three months, Fortnite looks to be striking while the iron is hot with its next collab.

Fortnite Leakers Tease Kpop Demon Hunters Collaboration

According to numerous leakers, a new Fortnite collab is in the works with Netflix's KPop Demon Hunters. SpuishFNBR and Loolo were the first to share the leak, who claim that the collab will arrive during this season in Fortnite , which is slated to end on November 1. At the moment, neither account has shared many details about the leak, but indicated that more would be revealed in the coming weeks, or even a single week. A new Fortnite update will arrive in the third week of September, which will likely be promptly datamined, so that may be what the leakers are referring to.

Thus far, the notion of a collab between the two media properties has received a pretty positive response from the Fortnite fandom. Players are already hoping and asking for things like a Soda Pop emote, character skins based on Rumi, Mira, and Zoey of Huntr/x, or even the Saja Boys, and backbling based on the pet tiger and magpie. With Kpop Demon Hunters currently enjoying extreme popularity, it's likely that many players will be eager to check out the collab.

With that said, Fortnite is currently drowning in rumors and leaks regarding upcoming collaborations in the game. Other recent leaks have indicated that Fortnite will cross over with Sonic the Hedgehog , indie co-op game REPO , survival horror legend Silent Hill , Deep Rock Galactic , streamer IShowSpeed, and more. Meanwhile, the Power Rangers Megazord Rising event will arrive on September 18, and run until October 3. Fortnite regularly collabs with other properties, and with recent leaks indicating that the planned crossovers will feature such varying themes, properties, and personalities, it's likely that even those who don't enjoy KPop Demon Hunters have something to look forward to in Fortnite 's future.

293
8.9 /10

Fortnite
